section.title: Cannot find suitable emulator for x86_64
Problem
section.para: When you attempt to create a VM, the error shows the VM is in the BUILD then ERROR state.

section.title: Solution
section.para: On the KVM host run, cat /proc/cpuinfo. Make sure the vme and svm flags are set.

Follow the instructions in the
enabling KVM section of the Configuration Reference to enable hardware virtualization support in your BIOS.
